## Vectors in R

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow", TRUE)

class(marmots)

# when working with vectors, every element has to be in the same class.
```

Create a numeric vector

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.9, 5)

class(pika)
```

Integer values

```{r}
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L)
```
